Text: Can someone Tell me how to make samples of the pictures

Use a free image host like imgbox.com and paste the link in the description. The bayimg doesn't work since a few days. Btw., it isn't the best idea to share a single .zip file. Split it into groups with names, or leave it in a folder. The most torrent-clients can handle up to 5.000 files in a single upload.

a .zip file makes it look like you're trying to hide something (like a virus). Many users (like me) won't touch a .zip file.

It's best just to have just a big folder w/sub-folders for categories. If you have sub-folders you might want to include one called 'samples' with a couple from each other folder for those that want to download part of the torrent to check it out first (this is on top of the linked images).

I tried making samples but they didnt show up also I wouldnt even know how to make a virus, I am just trying to learn to share with you guys after many years of only downloading. So what your saying is just put 5000 pictures in a folder and upload it not as a zip?

hey Amvet, your efforts are always appreciated but you also need seeders for your torrents as well...maybe schedule seeding time for night-time for "X" number of hours?...

thanx
